name: PauseSpace
signal_source: Digital detox research shows users frustrated with rigid blocking, citing 'you can't schedule sessions' and inflexible time periods
description: Flexible digital break app that creates intentional boredom periods with customizable scheduling and gentle re-engagement
target_user: Users seeking digital detox but frustrated with all-or-nothing blocking apps that don't fit their work schedules
pain_point_evidence: Users complain 'I don't need my apps to be blocked for 24 hours' and want scheduled focus periods that adapt to daily rhythms
differentiation: Flexible scheduling vs. rigid blocking, focuses on mindful re-engagement over complete restriction
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced scheduling, mindfulness content, and usage analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic scheduling, premium for advanced features and content
